name: Pick a piece Village
description:
'Over 12 turns, place pieces on a board to meet the turn/end goals of each, and unlock additional character pieces at the right time to aim for your highest point score.'

|| GAMEPLAY ||

Play the instructional game to learn the fundamentals in context,
then choose from the available game modes to aim for a personal high score.

  • A digital Roll-and-write like game via cards with a deck you can view strategically
  • Place both pieces on cards drawn each round with various scoring conditions
  • Character pieces to unlock, score and plan around at the same time
  • Play custom/daily modes that makes it easy to compare and compete with others
  • Save an image of your final layout and score

You can always press "?" in-game to review information on how to play.
- You can view this full screen by clicking in the bottom right hand corner.
- You can also visit this page and play the game on mobile.

Breaking ties: If you want to break a tied score,
I suggest using the highest total turn placement bonus
(add the values in the bottom left of each piece at the scoring screen).
